Topic.Title: How do you change your picture on your profile?

Posts.EditableText: I really want to upload my own photo onto my profile but I don't know how could anyone help me?
Posts.HTML: I really want to upload my own photo onto my profile but I don't know how could anyone help me?

Posts.EditableText: Click user profile on top right of screen, click edit profile then click avatar in the left panel.
Posts.HTML: Click user profile on top right of screen, click edit profile then click avatar in the left panel.

Posts.EditableText:
HI.
Click on the User Control panel link at the top of the screen. Then select the Profile tab. From here choose Edit Avatar and add your picture. Don't forget to save(submit) before you exit. And there you have it.
Posts.HTML:
